issue.title: [Format] Update integration test JSON format documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This has slipped behind what is in the integration tests

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5563?focusedCommentId=17032012) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This is no longer in Metadata.rst. There is docs/format/Integration.rst. I'll update some other related docs in the process.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5563?focusedCommentId=17052645) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
